data.text: “Adɛn enti na Onyankopɔn nhyɛ berɛ mma atemmuo?
Nnipa yiyi aboɔ a wɔde ato hyeɛ;
Wɔpam nwisiaa mfunumu
Wɔsum ahiafoɔ firi ɛkwan so
Ahiafoɔ no yɛ wɔn adwuma pɛ aduane
Wɔboaboa mmoa aduane ano wɔ mfuo no so
Wɔnni ntoma, na wɔda kwaterekwa;
Mmepɔ so osutɔ fɔ wɔn twɔnn
Wɔte awisiaa firi nufoɔ ano;
Wɔnenam adagya a wɔnni ntoma;
Wɔkyi ngo wɔn adan mu;
Wɔn a wɔrewuwuo no apinisie firi kuropɔn no mu,
“Ebinom wɔ hɔ a wɔsɔre tia hann no,
Sɛ adekyeɛ hann no kɔ a, owudifoɔ no sɔre
Ɔwaresɛefoɔ twɛn ɛberɛ a adeɛ resa;
Esum mu na nnipa bubu apono wura afie mu,
Esum kabii yɛ adekyeɛ ma wɔn nyinaa;
“Nanso wɔte sɛ ahuro a ɛtɛ nsuo ani;
Sɛdeɛ ɔhyew ne ɔpɛ de sukyerɛmma a anane korɔ no,
Awotwaa werɛ firi wɔn,
Wɔde ɔbaa bonini a ɔnni ba yɛ haboa,
Onyankopɔn nam ne tumi so twe atumfoɔ kɔ;
Ɔtumi ma wɔn tena ase asomdwoeɛ mu,
Wɔma wɔn so berɛ tiawa bi, na afei wɔnni hɔ bio;
“Sɛ yei nte saa a, hwan na ɔbɛtumi agye me akyinnyeɛ
